links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (-9,10).
maple: a:=n->sum ((-10)^j, j=0..n): seq(a(n), n=0..25);# [From _Zerinvary Lajos_, Dec 16 2008]
prog: (Sage) [gaussian_binomial(n,1,-10) for n in xrange(1,19)] # [From _Zerinvary Lajos_, May 28 2009](MAGMA) I:=[1, -9]; [n le 2 select I[n] else -9*Self(n-1) +10*Self(n-2): n in [1..30]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Oct 22 2012
